reviews.text:
Train station operated by Great Western railway, and has trains run by Great Western Railway, Cross Country, Transport for wales and West Midlands trains.

It has 4 platforms - platforms 1 & 2 are an extension of each other and Platform 1 is a fair walk down - Platform 3 is by platform 2, and platform 4 is over the bridge

It is staffed and has a barrier - so you will either have bought you ticket to enter or on the train before you go out

It has trains to Cardiff, Cheltenham (and beyond) Bristol (and beyond), Nottingham and good connections at these places.  The bus station is also close by good integrated transport) and walkable to the centre, cathedral, shops etc.

Staff are around and has waiting areas if cold

I am so grateful to the staff at Gloucester Railway Station and Stroud. I left my handbag at Gloucester Station in the cafe just before getting onto the Stroud train. When I got to Stroud I realised what I had done and the  really kind & friendlyman at Stroud Station phoned through to Gloucester and let me know they had found it. I went back to Gloucester & picked it up. I was so relieved and really grateful to all the staff at both stations for all their help and kindness. Thank you & I am so grateful to you as I would not have had any way of getting home. Thank you once again and top marks for superb service :-)
Very nice helpful staff:) also clean station
Like driving but less direct lol

Would like to say a big thank you to Charles, who assisted me to my train today. Your help was muchly appreciated and I managed to catch the next train that you also advised me on. Merry Christmas to all the staff at Gloucester!
